participant_1.background:
I have always been close to my parents.
I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

participant_2.background:
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
i love to cook ethnic foods.
I enjoy watching cooking videos but am not very good at cooking myself.
I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!
I'm from Scandinavia, where my Viking ancestors are from.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
Good, thank you! I'm excited for the pride parade this weekend!
Nice! I've never been to one, but I've heard they're fun.
They are! There's always a lot of energy and excitement in the air.
Where are you from?
I'm from Scandinavia, but I've been living in the U.S. for a few years now.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to visit Scandinavia.
You should! It's beautiful there.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, cook, and watch TV.
What do you like to read?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question! I have a lot of favorites, but I think I'd have to say The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times myself.
I'm glad to hear that! What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the world Tolkien created and the characters he wrote.
Me too! They're so well-developed and memorable.
I'm glad we agree!
Me too
